inspirational.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
inspirational.author: Steve Jobs

inspirational.text: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.
inspirational.author: Steve Jobs

inspirational.text: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work.
inspirational.author: Steve Jobs

inspirational.text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
inspirational.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

inspirational.text: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
inspirational.author: Aristotle

inspirational.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
inspirational.author: Winston Churchill

inspirational.text: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
inspirational.author: Tony Robbins

inspirational.text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
inspirational.author: Theodore Roosevelt

funny.text: I'm not superstitious, but I am a little stitious.
funny.author: Michael Scott

funny.text: I told my wife she was drawing her eyebrows too high. She looked surprised.
funny.author: Anonymous

funny.text: I haven't slept for ten days, because that would be too long.
funny.author: Mitch Hedberg

funny.text: The early bird might get the worm, but the second mouse gets the cheese.
funny.author: Willie Nelson

funny.text: I'm reading a book about anti-gravity. It's impossible to put down!
funny.author: Anonymous

funny.text: Why don't scientists trust atoms? Because they make up everything!
funny.author: Anonymous

funny.text: I used to hate facial hair, but then it grew on me.
funny.author: Anonymous

life.text: Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans.
life.author: John Lennon

life.text: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
life.author: Dalai Lama

life.text: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
life.author: Confucius

life.text: In the end, we will remember not the words of our enemies, but the silence of our friends.
life.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

life.text: The only way to make sense out of change is to plunge into it, move with it, and join the dance.
life.author: Alan Watts

life.text: Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.
life.author: Charles R. Swindoll

life.text: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
life.author: Oscar Wilde

life.text: Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, today is a gift of God, which is why we call it the present.
life.author: Bill Keane

wisdom.text: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
wisdom.author: Socrates

wisdom.text: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
wisdom.author: Albert Einstein

wisdom.text: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
wisdom.author: Lao Tzu

wisdom.text: Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe.
wisdom.author: Albert Einstein

wisdom.text: A room without books is like a body without a soul.
wisdom.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

wisdom.text: The fool doth think he is wise, but the wise man knows himself to be a fool.
wisdom.author: William Shakespeare

success.text: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.
success.author: Albert Schweitzer

success.text: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
success.author: John D. Rockefeller

success.text: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
success.author: Walt Disney

success.text: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
success.author: Winston Churchill

success.text: The successful warrior is the average man with laser-like focus.
success.author: Bruce Lee

success.text: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
success.author: Roy T. Bennett
